data.title: Perfect
data.text: Loved the decor.  It's a Steampunk design .  The husband and wife team were polite,friendly,knowledgeable. The food was delicious.  It's a very relaxing atmosphere.  Well worth high tea or for just a pot of tea with a treat.  I will be going back .

data.title: Very intriguing insides, Still coming up to speed
data.text: They serve tea. Steampunk theme. Part highbrow, part lowbrow of eclectic mechanisms. When you order a pot of tea you get a cookie or two to go with it. Has potential. But, the name? Anything with a color after "Clockwork" reminds me of the movie about a psychopathic murderer.
